messages.subject: Re: Re: The Joke of Rehabilitaton
messages.msgSnippet: Have you been lurking? Or have I been asleep.  Good to hear what I think of as progressive voices out there. ... -- best wishes Joel For a wonderful gift
messages.messageBody:
Have you been lurking? Or have I been asleep. Good to hear what I think of
as progressive voices out there.

Shay Seaborne wrote:

> From: Shay Seaborne <s-seaborne@...>
>
> LASaliger@...
> Subject: Re: The joke of Rehabilitation
>
> <SNIP> When is our sick society going to take responsibility for creating
> an environment which produces the kids they're complaining so much
> about?>>>>>
>
> That's the source of the problem, IMHO. If America were as
> child-friendly as we *say* we are, very few kids would grow up in places
> that create criminals.
>
> -Shay
>
> FOLC eclectic homeschool support group http://expage.com/page/folcfolks
> VaEclecticHomeschool discussion list
> http://www.onelist.com/subscribe/VaEclecticHomeschool
> Virginia Homeschoolers: join VHEA
> http://www.people.virginia.edu/~pm6f/vhea.html
> All homeschoolers: join the National Home Education Network
> http://www.nhen.org
>
>
> > Message boards, timely articles, a free newsletter and more!
> Check it all out at: http://www.unschooling.com

--
best wishes
Joel

For a wonderful gift possibility and to support a great cause check out:
http://www.naturalchild.com/calendar_pictures.html

All children behave as well as they are treated. The Natural Child
Project http://naturalchild.com/home/

messages.subject: Re: The Joke of Rehabilitaton
messages.msgSnippet: LASaliger@aol.com Subject: Re: The joke of Rehabilitation  When is our sick society going to take responsibility for creating an environment which
messages.messageBody:
LASaliger@...
Subject: Re: The joke of Rehabilitation

<SNIP> When is our sick society going to take responsibility for creating
an environment which produces the kids they're complaining so much
about?>>>>>


That's the source of the problem, IMHO. If America were as
child-friendly as we *say* we are, very few kids would grow up in places
that create criminals.

-Shay
